Erie.Erie Art Museum: Erie Art Museum is an art museum in Erie, Pennsylvania. The Museum maintains an ambitious program of changing exhibitions, embracing a wide range of subjects, both historical and contemporary and including folk art, contemporary craft, multi-disciplinary installations, community-based work, and traditional media. It holds a collection of over 8,000 objects, with strengths in American ceramics, Tibetan paintings, Indian bronzes, contemporary baskets, photography, and many other mediums.
